posts.post_content: T206 Walter Johnson, portrait, PSA 5 - $1500. delivered.  Steve at [url]parmentier@wbcable.net[/url]   Rock solid corners for the grade, and great overall picture quality.

The T206 Walter Johnson PSA 5 - put it on ebay yesterday.  Also have a very nice 1949 Satchell Paige PSA 6 put on ebay yesterday.  Two great looking cards.  I wouldn't normally let these two go as they are nice for the grade, BUT.......gotta help fund my 2 REA wins.  steve
